relationship_Misty Mountains_3.question: My dear fellow, what is the name of the mountain range that lies to the east of the Shire, a place often traversed by hobbits on their journeys?
relationship_Misty Mountains_3.text: My dear fellow, what is the name of the mountain range that lies to the east of the Shire, a place often traversed by hobbits on their journeys?

multiple_choice_moonshine_4.question: As I stand beneath the silvery glow of the moon, deep within the sacred woods of Lothlórien, I am reminded of a certain elixir cherished among the folk of the Shire. It is said that this nectar, which shimmers with the light of the stars, offers a taste of joy and warmth, especially during the long, cold nights. Pray tell, what is this delightful brew known as, celebrated for its sweetness and often shared among friends? Is it: A) Mead, B) Cider, C) Moonshine, or D) Ale?
multiple_choice_moonshine_4.text: As I stand beneath the silvery glow of the moon, deep within the sacred woods of Lothlórien, I am reminded of a certain elixir cherished among the folk of the Shire. It is said that this nectar, which shimmers with the light of the stars, offers a taste of joy and warmth, especially during the long, cold nights. Pray tell, what is this delightful brew known as, celebrated for its sweetness and often shared among friends? Is it: A) Mead, B) Cider, C) Moonshine, or D) Ale?
